1.1.0.en: Added a flip clock, made some clocks transparent, and fixed some bugs.

1.1.1.en: Fixes some bugs in the flipclock and analog clocks.

1.1.2.en: Updated the flip clock to look better.

1.2.0.en: Added a 12-hour option to the Flip Clock.

1.2.1.en: Fixed an issue where the flip clock would keep loading.
